ovdesc.p: This ‘L’ table contains the list of SEPA.LAYOUT, SEPA.FIELDS, SEPA.HEADER etc whose record values are needed for SEPA processing
Whenever the records in each these applications are amended and authroised this concat file is updated with the modified value

desc.p: This field holds the value of Record Key of other applications whose recquired details are stored
Up to 35 characters free text. Multi-value field
This field holds the Mandatory field details of records from other SEPA applications like SEPA.LAYOUT,SEPA.FIELDS etc
Up to 120 characters free text. Multi-value field
